items.title: Dr. Powers Trans Care Powerpoint v6.0
items.description: Dr. Powers is a doctor who specializes in trans care and has developed his own methodology for care

items.title: Dr. Powers Transgender care presentation
items.description: While this presentation is aimed at providers, not patients, there's still lots of good info in here

items.title: Informed Consent Map
items.description: Map of locations in the US which provide informed consent access to HRT

items.title: Transcend Legal Resources
items.description: Excellent guides for getting your insurance to cover your care and for changing your documents

items.title: Transgender Law Center
items.description: National trans-let organization. Lots of programs and resources here

items.title: Refuge Restrooms
items.description: App and website to that lets you find and share the locations of gender neutral bathrooms

items.title: PFLAG
items.description: Helps to educate families of LGBTQ folx, and holds family support groups

items.title: "That was dysphoria?" 8 signs and symptoms of indirect gender dysphoria
How Do I Know If I'm Transfeminine?
Dear Philosophers, You Can Trust the Feminist Consensus: Gender-Critical Radical Feminism is Bogus
items.description: Article by a cis philosopher taking down TERF arguments

items.title: Super Late Bloomer: My Early Days in Transition by Julia Kaye
items.description: A highly personal collection documenting the early months of artist Julia Kayeâ€™s gender transition. A great read, and has been pretty effective at helping friends and family understand what being trans entails

items.title: Yes, You Are Trans Enough: My Transition from Self-Loathing to Self-Love
items.description: A personal, touching Book by Mia Violet
